title: Top/Support Wanted, Plat/Gold 1 +
body:
My team is looking for a Gold 1, or higher, Top Laner or Support/Mid to join for a upcoming online tournament.

We are looking for a motivated individual who wants a win, as the team is aiming towards to the Finals/Semi. 

Our members have previously played in a tournament and have made it the quarter finals, so we are also motivated to put the effort forward but we also want to have fun during the process. 

If you are interested, please add me on  :Hahoon (prefer)  or  Willyumm

:) 


Note: The team is consisted of Plats and Golds.

replies.body: wassup fam. Diamond 5 support main. Still looking for some fobs?

Hey mate
Im g4 right now but soon will be plat I hope XD
Top PREF
Can play supp as well
Awesome. Add me on 'Hahoon', and we can talk about setting up some games.

G3 now, climbing ever so slightly 
also added u
